descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/3347/calder.png[/img][/center]

[center][b]Hello again.[/b]
I wanna give you option to pick up my own version of Calder. Now he is vampirised. And... He will do more things. He will change his position more often, etc. End he look better, handsome... and what to say? Just enjoy. 

Ahh! And i have change his default armor, as you can see on 1 and 2 image ; )
If you want i can make him Werewolf too : ) And i can add him some Vampiric spell (now i do not change it).

[i]Sorry for my english.[/i]

[b]Calder v0.2[/b]
No more dirty face. 

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/10000-1-1329515695.png[/img]
[/center]

[b]My other mod\'s:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9809]Calder Better Look[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9807]Vampiric Marcurio[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9974]Belrand New Strenght[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10085]Vilkas Better Look[/url]



[b]Recommended mod\'s[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[b]Credits:[/b]
To creator of NPC Editor, i hope it will be more option soon, to make Skyrim companions much more better.
author: Gnatozuj

files.name: Calder clean face
files.changelogHtml: No more dirt on Calder face.
